overview: Sweetheart Video's celebrated showcase series presents Brandi Love in four unique stories with four of her favourite girls. For the second time, Brandi Love shows us her love for girls and pays homage to the hard work done by women around the world. She starts her showcase by playing a gym teacher to the incredible Carter Cruise. After a double shift at the diner, Brandi comes home to her stunning babysitter Autumn Falls. The lovely Aidra Fox finds comfort in the arms of her husbands employee. After serving her country for few years, Brandi finally comes home to her wife Elexis Monroe and has no desire to leave her arms anytime soon. With this showcase, Brandi shows you why shes the ultimate American Sweetheart.
title: Brandi Loves Girls 2
